title: Large-Scale Intentional Reflection Education Design to Reduce Diagnostic Errors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical knowledge and diagnostic processes
context.additional_context: Reflective thinking training for analyzing complex cases in flexible learning environments utilizing personal devices.

learning_goals: Identify at least three cognitive biases that cause diagnostic errors in complex clinical cases
Derive key elements in over 80% of case analyses by using intentional reflective questioning during the diagnostic process
Document reflection-based decision-making processes with over 70% accuracy in delayed assessment tests after two weeks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
